document.full_text: juliano mer-khamis, who directed a children's theater in the west bank city of jenin, was shot dead in his car by palestinian militants, the police said.
document.title: middle east: west bank: actor-activist killed by militants
lines_and_colors: juliano mer-khamis, who directed a children's theater in the west bank city of jenin, was shot dead in his car by palestinian militants, the police said.
